description:
This foundational module explores the challenges faced by key
stakeholders along the Translational Medicine continuum
(including patients, epidemiologists/data scientists, basic
scientists, clinician scientists, entrepreneurs, investors, and
regulators, etc) by examining real-life case-studies representing
the barriers that each face in their quest to develop a cure for
an unmet health care need.
title: Translational Medicine: From Unmet Need to Cure
